results.name: Square array read by antidiagonals: T(m,n) = number of spanning trees in C_m X C_n.
link: Germain Kreweras, Complexité et circuits Eulériens dans les sommes tensorielles de graphes, J. Combin. Theory, B 24 (1978), 202-212. See p. 210, Parag. 4.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Spanning Tree
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Torus Grid Graph
program: {T(n, k) = round(n*k*prod(a=1, n-1, prod(b=1, k-1, 4*sin(a*Pi/n)^2+4*sin(b*Pi/k)^2)))} \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Jan 13 2021
xref: Rows and columns 1..4 give A000027, A212797, A212798, A212799
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 27 2012
